attributes.action: Immediately end the pretence that the Downing Street e-petitions system is nothing more than a Government spin machine.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is clear that the Prime Minister and this government dismiss any petition that criticises or runs counter to the Governments views, policies or actions. Recent examples of the attitude to democratically expressed views and opinions can be found by the responses to petitions on road toll charges and the fiasco of servicemen and women being paid for their stories.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
